content.detailedDescription: At 8:54 pm, looking w/sw at about 45 degrees, my wife & i saw an usually bright and pulsating set of lights. on review of the photos taken on our little samsung digital camera, i zoomed in on my microsoft 10 zoom feature and the photos seem to change shape, colors, and there appear to be a couple knobs on the top. maybe there are high clouds refracting the light changes? beats me.
content.summary: Unusually bright, pulsating multi colored lights w/sw.  camera is samsung st 201 10x zoom. taken from front porch.

content.detailedDescription:
i was heading south on santa barbara blvd around nicholas pkwy. i observed a greyish oval shaped object to the far right of large electric poles and at twice their elavation. to the north-east of the object approx 300 - 500 feet closer to me were bright silver flashes. the flashes seemed random in a confined cylinder area. my first thought was a silver plane towing a banner. i tried in my mind to visualize a plane but there was not a solid object where the lights (flashes) where located. i tried to visualize a plane towing silver streamers but the object was not a plane.
  i only observed for 40 seconds before my turn east toward home. the object seemed stationary and i seen no attachments between the flashes and grey object and no wires attached to the object. i have tried since then to explain in my mind what happened with logic but cannot. i have looked for other reports but none there. i did not expect to see something like this in my area and during the day.
  possible balloon with streamers but the flashes were not solid in nature and i did not see any writing on the object or lines attached.
  it looked like a ufo extracting energy from the high power lines as i think about it today.
content.summary: Oval dull grey orb with reflective silver random away from object

content.detailedDescription: It was flying in straight line and hovering not aplane not a helicopter too far to be a drone is .The object shoots lights from above and below. can’t be an intelligence balloon because in was flying and not stationary. that’s it.
content.summary: Ufo was hovering flying slow in straight line

content.detailedDescription: I heard about the experience the following morning when i phoned home while i was on the road driving truck my partner informed me the previous evening she believed she had an encounter with 2-3 possible greys. said she was woken up by the tv turning off and feeling something in the bedroom then she remembers feeling fear and trying to getaway and could hear voices inside her head telling her to calm down and it will be over soon don’t fight she proceeded to try and crawl away from them and recalls being grabbed on the forearm by one of the entities and it feeling incredibly strong and it was at that point she can’t remember what happened after but wakes up a bit later in bed room is in disarray tv is back on but she got up and went to the bathroom and it was at that point she had noticed the dog was cowering in the boardroom and had proceeded to deficate down the stairs away from the bedroom towards the bathroom that is when she recalls the door was open which she always closes when she goes to bed the bedroom door opened into the room and it was at that point she called me to tell me what has happened she has written it off as a dream
content.summary: Possible abduction plus contact with entity

content.detailedDescription: I was watching out my eastside window .There this object hoovering above the hills. near a power station. i took a image. i could see cleary on its right side windows.I was stunned. i couldn't believe it. you can clearly see the terminator of light and shadow. the shadow was on the right side of this hoovering object.The light side on the left.There where the windows were.My thoughts turned around. and i thought ,how long did they hoovering there? do they observing me? was i too ,been abducted? without knowledge? or to reminding it? anyway the image speaks for itself. i guess. thanks.Mike.
content.summary: Take a picture and see that awesome object hoovering above the hills in east direction from my home .Image from a window looking east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend at the edge of a pond. it was a very bright summer night and the moon was bright, the sky was clear, there were no clouds that night. we even commented that the night was too clear and that the next day would be a beautiful beach day. at times she was lying down and asked me what it would be like above the car, and when we left, we saw that other people were seeing it too. it was immense, totally obliterated and silent, a ship in the form of a chaturo, all metallic, in total silence, and very quietly heading towards the sea. 
my cell phone, did not capture the image because it did not work right at that time and that the other people also realized. the object continued a straight path towards the sea and suddenly accelerated very rapidly to space completely disappearing. we were in shock with what we saw and it was a very strange experience, confusing and that makes me think every day.
content.summary: Looks a like a giant cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: I was laying at the basketball court on cross canyon doing sit-ups when i noticed a spinning object very high up in the atmosphere that was stationary and as it made a full revolution reflected light back down. it remain there for approximately 5 minutes and another passerby was in the area and i asked them to verify what they saw. we both agreed it was too high to be a drone and several aircraft seem to fly past the area where this object was... this also happened about 6 months ago almost in the exact same place and i saw the same thing and airplanes flew by and sprayed something over the sky which caused the sky to haze up in obstructed view of the object that was stationary for almost 30 minutes
content.summary: Rotating object that relected light when it turned...Then when it left...I saw something like falling leaves

content.detailedDescription: I live in montreal, i saw three round horizontally aligned blinking all at the same time and two round lights on each side has a good distance from the other three. no, it was not an aircraft and no, it was not stars! i was looking in the sky while i noticed her light brighter than ordinary stars i try to take a video of the three light but with a iphone camera we see nothing i only caught one of the two alone lights
content.summary: I live in montreal, i saw three round horizontally aligned blinking all at the same time and two round lights on each side has a good distance from the other three. no, it was not an aircraft and no, it was not stars! i was looking in the sky while i noti

content.detailedDescription:
This event occurred at approximately 1015pm on sunday march 18, 2018 while i was out in the balcony having a smoke (tobacco) with my girlfriend. neither one of us were under the influence of any substances. the object in question appeared to be a triangular shaped object with dull amber lights at each corner. it's surface appeared to be cloudy and almost see through. my estimation would be that it was at definitely under 5000 feet but not less than 1000 above ground. it was spotted at about 45 degrees above the horizon in the se sky travelling nw-nnw in a straight line at a steady speed (relatively fast, significantly faster than an approaching/departing plane). the whole encounter took 3-4 seconds at most before the object was no longer visible (obstructed by rooftops).

i am fully aware that this area is an approach/departure path taken by aircraft coming in and out of toronto pearson, and one such aircraft had just passed overhead a few moments earlier. there was absolutely no ambient noise nor visible exhaust generated by the object in question. 

both of us spoke about what we saw right after and have agreed that it is something we cannot identify.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle shape with 3 amber lights at edges. cloudy/misty see-through appearing surface.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up at 4am, laying in bed, 2 bright silver lights a fair distance apart from each other, stayed parallel to each other, about twice the speed of a satellite. dawn/light blue sky/ approx brightness of the brightest star at night.

definitely 2 separate objects, keeping course, very high in the sky with no clouds.. if it was a high flying plane it would have been visible at the brightness of our dawn 4am winter time.
content.summary: 2 bright silver lights a fair distance apart from each other, stayed parallel to each other, about twice the speed of a satellite. dawn/light blue sky/ approx brightness of the brightest star at night

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in fowler,ca this event happened in november in 2013 at night. i lived in the country surrounded by grapevines. i saw a large white ball of light in front of my house a few yards away about telephone pole high. it was stationary for minutes until it slowly glided to my right and finally
vanished. i was watching this light for about 15 minutes or longer as i was taking photos of it.
there was no noise coming from it. it looked to have light emitted from inside it. no windows, no wings, no trail left behind. i couldn't believe it was so close to my house right above the grape vineyard. my feeling were that i was surprised and astonished and knew it was not a common thing to see. i was the only witness.
at that time i was using my nikon d50 camera. 

thank you.

[name removed/cms/rjl] 
fresno,ca
content.summary: While at night i saw a bright white roundish/oval shaped solid orb no sound and was stationary i saw a minutes watching and taking photos that it had moved slowly over the grapevines and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a smoke, facing western sky. i was watching what i believe is a satellite traveling north. before the satellite went out of view i saw three lights in v formation coming south. i first thought they were three satellites but they were too close together, then the middle one, which was closer to the east light, moved closer to the west light and then back again before i lost sight of them. i'm hoping someone else north or south of toronto also saw this. i often see satellites but never seen three so close together.
content.summary: Observed three lights traveling south in v formation at 9:40 pm in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
There have been a few times that myself and my friend have been driving down west genesee street and we've seen suspicious lights in the sky in the same spot before fairmount fair between parsons drive and terry road.  the first time we saw them it was two white circular lights following us at tree level at the speed of our car. the lights looked like they were on a cylindar with blue green and red flashing lights above and below the circle lights.  eventually the ufo slowly dipped below tree level and we couldn't see it anymore.  

the second time i saw it i was driving by myself in the same location and i saw the same two lights doing the same thing. i remember thinking they looked like headlights in the sky.  at that exact moment the 2 lights formed a third directly above the other two.  so now there's 3 circular lights shaped like a triangle.  i watch the lights slowly morph together to form one triangular light in the sky still traveling at tree level horizonally at the speed of my car.  i lost it in the trees.

the third time i'm with my same friend as before driving down the same road. we see a triangular shape in the sky that looked exactly like the craft i saw the second time.  as we drove we noticed that we were passing it in the sky.  my friend said that it looked like car headlights.  we both lost it as it appeared to go below tree level and land somwhere beyond out knowledge.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reoccurring changing light sighting. travel at tree level. start as circular lights, come together to form triangular lights

content.detailedDescription:
Il ã©tait ã  peu prã¨s 22 heures lorsque je me promener sur la place du palais des papes, un soir d'ã©tã© de juillet 2016 lorsque je rencontre un phã©nomene qui reste aujourd'hui pour moi encore inexpliquã©.

alors que j'ã©tais au tã©lã©phone, mon regard est tout d'un coup attirer par une forte lumiã¨re verte ã©manante d'une trã¨s grosse structure noiratre, ã  quelques mã¨tres aux dessus de ma tãªte. j'ai tout dabord cru ã  un vol d'un drone, puis j'ai remarquer que les mouvements ã©tait beaucoup trop prã©cis pour en ãªtre un.

aucun bruit ne se dã©gageait de ce drã´le d'engin volant, et c'est ce qui m'a marquer.

le vol ã©tait stationnaire, il a durer une vingtaine de seconde puis ã  subitement disparu. j'ã©tais tellement choquer et effrayer que je n'ai mãªme pas eu le rã©flexe d'immortaliser la scã¨ne avec mon portable.
content.summary: J'ai remarquer une sorte d'ovni, comparable ã  un vaisseau, volant ã  quelques mã¨tres de ma tãªte.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sighting 3  @~6:15 am on 3.17.18 my husband mike & i were heading eastbound on garfield rd. to see if we could observe further activity. when we arrived at the same location as sighting 1 & 2 we exited the vehicle waited some time. i ended up snapping a couple photos of a suspected star, and a video of some lights in a flying v and changing formation. mike said "that's birds" upon further review this may be a flock of birds but the speed seems too fast so i am not sure, but hopeful your team can find something if it is there.
content.summary: Flying in formation, moving around in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work this morning on route 18 south, and i saw an unusual light in the sky around 6:35am. there is a tower at exit 15 that blinks red. i was about five minutes from that exit, and i saw a very bright white light off to the right of the tower. then the tree line obstructed my vision, when i got to exit 15 i could clearly see the tower, but the bright white light was gone. i drive this route at this time every tuesday morning, and i have never seen that light. at first, i thought it was a plane, but i could see it for at least a minute and it didn't move. then a couple minutes later, when the tree line obstruction was no longer an issue, the light was completely gone.
content.summary: Saw unusual bright light on way to work

content.detailedDescription: i was outside throwing the football with my two young boys and noticed two vessels in the sky traveling towards one another. it struck me odd, so much that i stopped throwing the football and took a closer look and realize that these objects were very far away but really really large.  and they were  traveling towards one another at a very close distance apart  from where i was standing it looked as though it might be a close call kind of thing. i did not think it was a large aircraft or drone or anything that i’ve seen before. it look like an (advil with lights on the side but white & lights were yellow and orange.) normally aircrafts don’t do that, fly directly forwards each other.  the larger of the two ufos were traveling north and the smaller of the two was traveling south. the one traveling south was leaving trails. and i lost track of the one traveling north  and they both basically disappeared.  both of my boys and my ex-wife thought that it was very odd and that i was not making a big deal of nothing.  after posting on facebook my fire chief told me that i should contact you folks and let you see the videos and pictures.  i’m just curious what it was?  when you see the video you will be able to judge for yourself that it just seems so far away and to be so large in the sky it did not seem right.
content.summary: To aerial devices traveling towards one another that seemed rather large to me and did not look like anything that i had seen before and struck me odd. i am very observant and detailed i am a firefighter and this is nothing that i have seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
My property is approximately 100 acres in a rural area, and backs onto a nature reserve.
 i  have been going there during the summer months since 2014 and  have seen several  ufo’s.
one instance was a bright red/orange light. i was in the middle of an intense conversation and at the time when i saw the ligh i thought to myself what is someone doing backing up at this time of the night.
but afterwards i realized that  there was no road near where the light was coming from, it was coming from one of my pastures.
content.summary: One event was a red/orange light, one was high in the sky white like a star

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen on tv many shows talking about rods, and if they are et or other ententes.
i have captured over many nights on my security cameras many objects that could answer some of those questions.
i will attempt to upload some
content.summary: It,s more r.O.D.S than ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen on tv many shows talking about rods, and if they are et or other ententes.
i have captured over many nights on my security cameras many objects that could answer some of those questions.
i will attempt to upload some
content.summary: It,s more r.O.D.S than ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband we’re standing at my front door this morning taking pictures of chemtrails above my house in belfast at around 11:35am when i later looked back at the pictures we had taken i noticed this small pink dot in the pictures when i zoomed in i realised this object had strange lights that seem to be changing formation could someone please have a look at my pictures and tell me what they think this could be as i’m intrigued thank you
content.summary: I was taking pics of chemtrails and when i looked back at the pics this pink object was there

content.detailedDescription:
I was out looking up at the sky when i saw something i could not believe i was seeing, i was stunned at trying to imagine what i was looking at and at the same time thinking it was not of this world. by the time i gained my thought . the object was zipping east at a very fast rate maybe east south east. this is what i saw. a large triangle shape that appeared to have -10 thrusters in triangle alignment inside triangles. the trail was a bright white light like a beam , i could also make out blue like flares comming off what i took to be the front of the object. soon the object was over the horzion and gone. the report was given to be an astroid. it was just too perfect in shape. i was astonished.
               .
             . . .
            .  .  .
           .   .   . something like this but inside the triangle the other "thrusters" were also in triangle configuration. the number was ten i believe,three to a side then 3, then one in the center.

thanks [name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: 10 thrusters in a perfect triangle at the rear.

content.detailedDescription: For a few months now i've been waking up and seeing binary code while awaking. i've never told anyone this but as a child i remember a craft landing it was a tube inside was a group of aliens it was a study group the teacher was teaching earth history somehow i managed to run inside the craft i saw all white walls windows and it seemed to curve all occupants were wearing white and just as startled as i was amazed. then everything went dark and i remember being on the ground when i woke up and in a daze 3 greys appeared to examine me not on a ship but inside my mind. one was tall and seemed to be the leader he was mad as if something had changed within me and now i was to be considered unworthy of their agenda all this happening within my mind. out of the 2 little greys one seemed not to agree but was harshly regarded by the tall one i could feel a connection to this little grey i could sense compassion as well as a family bond as if this little grey was a distant relative and the second little grey seemed disconnected from thought as if there was only obedience to the tall grey. i don't know if you are familiar with the word gleening but that's the world that pops in my head when i think back on that day. i felt like i knew why or at least part of the reason they were there was too save them from something bad coming and time was short. i can't express to you enough the connection i felt towards the little grey i know it was of the same origin as my family line. this is all i can remember but even it is fuzzy and i know there is more i don't know.
content.summary: Invisible craft less than 15ft away felt vibration then a hole opened and i saw a group dressed in white.

content.detailedDescription: My brother was outback using his telescope while i was watching tv. it was pointed to the western night sky. i was 13 or 14 years. the sky was clear. he suddenly called me in his excitement and asked to come out. i went out his direction as my brother asked me to look through the viewfinder. i witnessed the ufo moving down and sideways in a zigzag pattern to accelerate with an immens speed to the right and out of the view field. this couldn't be an insect as it would have been a blurry lightspot. the object was well defined in shape: a bright orange/yellow oval on its side with a sharp edge.
content.summary: Oval object/light seen through telescope by my brother first. i then witnessed the same through telescope. object moved zigzag downwards then accelerated very fast to right.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard letting my dog out when i looked up and seen a solid red light about 500' up in the sky about the size of a golf ball. below and slightly behind that diagonally 100' lower towards me was another red light the same as the top. below that another 100' toward me and behind was what looked like what a tr-3b has been described as. a triangular craft of some type with bright white, yellow/gold, blue, and red lights on the bottom of various sizes and on the side of the craft. i would estimate the side was approx. 12' tall... and each side of the triangle maybe 30' long. that bottom triangle craft was just 300' above and in front of me. 
 now what seemed weird is it was like the single red lights were pulling the tr-3b. the top one appeared to be connected somehow to the lower red light but by what i could not tell but i did see a very faint outline near the red light of something that seemed to be maybe 10' wide and black that led to the red light below that. the red lights seemed to be small though like the size of a basketball about 500' up. i'd guess the size of one of those tiny cars (le-car)...Maybe actual size 15' in diameter for each red light. 
 the whole thing was completely silent which considering how close it was amazed me in-and-of-itself. now it was heading towards the myrtle beach int. airport at approx. 45 mph.. very slowly but steady. now being as my close proximity to the airport i am quite used to seeing and hearing all types of aircraft go by from commercial craft to private planes and jets of all sizes along with all types of military helicopters and jets. i have never seen anything like this. there was no sound either upon approach, as it was dead in front of me diagonally or as it departed on its way. once it got closer to where i estimated the airport to be the red lights sped up and circled in a weird way but then was out of my sightline due to trees and distance. 
 if you take a pencil and put it in the air to your upper right hand and extend your arm out.. and have the eraser end facing your direction (but not facing you)and the lead end facing away from you and downward from the eraser and then slowly move the pencil from your right to your left not changing the direction of it then you can get an idea how i seen it. kind of like the following:

                                             **



 <-------                                        **




                                                      <i

...And move to the left of your screen never changing direction. the top two ** representing a single red light and 100' below that again another red single light and then the triangle craft below that which was lit up like uncle mack on saint paddys day. 
 my wife was also witness to the same thing. those two red lights were in no way, shape, or form big enough to tow that craft by any standard by what "we the people" are aware of. especially when they were close enough that i could see they had no wings and were silent yet that is exactly what it appeared they were doing... towing the tr-3b (or whatever the name is of the triangular craft that we have supposedly had for decades now in the shadow government.
content.summary: A red light then diagonal 100' below another and 100' below that a triangle that looked like a tr-3b

content.detailedDescription: While visiting sedona,az over the st. patrick's day holiday weekend i took some pictures of the surrounding mountains. later after looking at the pictures i found these 2 photos that have 2 strange lights(star burst) on them. thought i would share maybe someone else captured these also. the photos are taken with my phone, outside behind the sinagua plaza(320 az-89a)on the second floor. they were take on march 17, 2018 at 11:57am and 11:58am. let me know what you think.
content.summary: Bright star like objects in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
Bonjour

tout a ã©tã© scrupuleusement consignã© dans mon journal de l'epoque de l'observation, avec croquis, date exacte...Je le chercherai et referai le temoignage.
je n'ai pas le temps d'expliciter ici j'espã¨re que je pourrais reprendre le temoignage plus tard.
un objet qui etait en surplace sur leur maison. il faisait la taille de la maison environ 16 mã¨tres de long. mon pã¨re et mon frã¨re ã©taient a l'intã©rieur. c'etait l'hiver il faisait nuit les fenetres ã©taient fermã©es. nous avons dirigã© les phares sur elle et lã , comme si nous l'avions derangã©e elle a commencã©  ã  lentement bouger. elle est passã©e sur nous (qui ã©tions en voiture) je pouvais presque la toucher. une forme triangulaore aux bouts arrondis..Etluminescente quand elle est passã©e sur nous avec des lumiã¨res de couleurs et une carcasse grise. nous sommes restees interloquã©es. elle a glissã© ensuite dans le ciel. d'autres infos au besoin. merci pour votre lecture.
content.summary: Une soucoupe qui faisait du surplace ã  2m du toit de la maison de mes parents et que l'on a dã©range e elle a glissã© alors dans le ciel

content.detailedDescription: I was in london filming planes. i only saw the orb after viewing the footage of the plane that is in the video. the orb appears to ascend extremely quickly appearing only briefly as it seems to slow down . i've seen and filmed 7 or 8 other ufo events in this same location in 2 years.
content.summary: I was filming planes flying above london when upon reviewing my footage i saw the orb ascend rapidly above the path of the plane

content.detailedDescription: I was guarding the top floor of a parking structure as a night security officer at about pass 0300 and i was inside my patrol car with the engine idling listening to the radio. the radio signal suddenly became disrupted for no apparent reason and i caught in the corner of my eye a slow moving glowing object that appeared as a disc shape. it appeared out of nowhere and was slowing gliding towards n.E. and i was kind of fixated to it, staring at it for a good approximately 5 minuets before it disappeared in thin air, it did not shot off the sky, it just slowly disappeared in thin air. after it was gone the radio signal came back to normal and the time in the car changed to 0400, i checked the time on my wristwatch and my mobile phone and they are all showing the same time. i know and i felt that i was only watching the object for less than 10 minuets, but somehow an hour had passed.
content.summary: Guarding parking structure while posted on top floor

content.detailedDescription: Out back of my shop talking to an employee. looking up like usual. i spotted it hovering above clouds & 2-3 times the distance of airplanes. it made a slight circular directional movement. i knew it was a ufo since it was not behaving like an airplane or other common aircraft. this went on about 1.5 minutes. both myself & employee saw it. it was like an orb or a star. my employee mentioned airplanes to compare. i diverted my eye lock on the object to compare to the current aircraft in the vicinity. when i looked back out was gone. i searched the sky for several minutes & didn't see it again. we discussed that it was not a star or planet becoming visable because if it was we'd all be able to see it. i am confident it was not a satellite or space station as i've witnessed those before & it did not traverse the sky line.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Basically hovering orb-like 2-3 times the distance of airplanes then  disappeared
